text: Henry Vernon Howell (December 28, 1932 â€“ March 9, 2019) was a Canadian professional hockey player. He was born in Hamilton, Ontario. Howell played for the NHL with the teams New York Rangers, Oakland Seals and the Los Angeles Kings. Howell was added into the Hockey Hall of Fame in 1979. Howell died at a care facility in Hamilton of complications from Alzheimer's disease on March 9, 2019 at the age of 86.New York Rangers legend Harry Howell dies at 86 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Anderson, Dave. "Two Rangers Sweaters Will Rise Where a Cup Banner Didn't," The New York Times, Sunday, February 22, 2009. title: Harry Howell
